events.name: PALO IT Open House
events.description:
Come and experience how it feels like to work in a cutting-edge technology company! At this event, attendees can meet our techies, chat with Innovation experts and even drop your resumes!
Date: 28 July 2017, Friday
Time: 11:00am to 11:30am, 3:00pm to 3:30pm
Venue: 26A Circular Road, Singapore 049382

What to expect:


Learn more about PALO IT and its unique Palowan culture


Agile 101: What is Agile and do we really practice Agile?


Innovation studio and its purpose


PALO IT Innovation experts showcase & Q&A (Feel free to ask tough questions)


Free goodie bags to take away!


 
PS: Looking for a job in tech? We provide free career consultation too! ;)
This would be the perfect first-step towards stepping into the tech industry. Spread the word and see you then!
events.location: PALO IT Singapore, 26A Circular Road, Singapore 049382

events.name: A fresh approach to the Rubik's Cube
events.description:
This series of small group (3-5 individuals) classes is designed for individuals who love puzzles and have always wanted to solve a Rubik’s Cube, as well as for those who may have learned to solve a 3x3 cube through basic instruction, but would like to to gain a deeper understanding and move on to more complicated dimensions. The lessons from this method are easily applicable to 2x2 to 7x7 Rubik's cubes and a range of complex puzzles as well as real life challenges. It may be frustrating at first, because I will challenge you to figure out a few things yourself, but please stick with it!
Group 1 starting on Friday, 28 July from 17:00 to 18:00
Group 2 starting on Friday, 28 July from 18:15 to 19:15
Group 3 starting on Saturday, 29 July from 10:30 to 11:30
Please come for the session for which you have registered.
events.location: Marina Bay Residences, 18 Marina Boulevard, Singapore 018980

events.name: First Code Academy Summer Camps Info Session
events.description:
Learn to think by learning to code.
Know more about First Code Academy's pedagogy and comprehensive roadmap designed for students as young as 5 years old.
Come join us for an Info Session! Learn more about the course content, hear from the instructors, and discover what it means for your child to learn at First Code Academy.Please feel free to let us know if you have any questions in the meantime. Contact us: hellosg@firstcodeacademy.com | 6820 2633 


Shaping Future Creators
First Code Academy is a leading education institute that teaches kids coding courses and develop curriculum for K-12 students to learn not just coding skills, but computational thinking. Our goal is to empower children and teenagers to become creative leaders in the digital era, for their future career and for driving social change.
events.location: First Code Academy, 04-13 Stamford Court, 61 Stamford Road, Singapore 178892
